mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (customerId, productId, vendorId) VALUES (#{customerId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vendorId, jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM favorite f INNER JOIN (SELECT price, quantity, productId, vendorId FROM vendor_product) vp on vp.productId = f.productId AND vp.vendorId = f.vendorId INNER JOIN (SELECT productName, id, listPrice FROM product) p on p.id = f.productId INNER JOIN (SELECT vendorId, vendorName FROM vendor_info) v on v.vendorId = f.vendorId INNER JOIN (SELECT content, productId FROM image where imageOrder = 1) i on i.productId = f.productId WHERE customerId = #{customerId}
